NO ONE READS THIS, BUT I WARNED YOU IF ANYTHING...
1. The application stores bank card data in unencrypted form. Application data protection is provided by the built-in algorithms for data protection and encryption in the Android operating system.
2. The mode of installing a secure login to the application by PIN code does not use password encryption algorithms. The main task of this mode is to restrict access to bank card data when transferring a mobile device to trusted persons who do not have illegal intentions to hack the application and its database.
3. The application does not implement data transmission to third-party applications, data transmission over wireless networks and the Internet.
4. The application does not have the ability to create a backup copy, transfer to other devices, synchronize the bank card database between devices. If the application is deleted, it is not possible to restore previously entered data.
5. The developer of the application does not bear any responsibility for the leakage of bank card data.
6. The user, when storing bank card data in this application, must ensure reliable protection of his device using biometric identification systems, password identification and the use of antivirus applications at the level of the Android operating system. In addition, the user must provide reliable protection against theft of the device by intruders.
7. In case of loss of the device and the risk of using bank card data by intruders, it is recommended to contact the bank servicing the card in order to block it.
Select an action with the card
The minimum length of the PIN code is 4 digits.
Select an action with the bank
